sent.orig: At 73% and 70% similarity, BOX-PCR and ERIC-PCR dendrogram were composed of 18 groups respectively.
sent.trans: 在73%和70%的相似性水平上，BOX-PCR和ERIC-PCR的树状图将全部菌株主要聚为18群，可以看出BOX-PCR和ERIC-PCR树里的属、种关系较乱。

sent.orig: MADS-box genes encode a family of transcriptional factors that play a key role in flower development.
sent.trans: MADS-box基因是一个大的转录因子家族，在花发育过程中起重要作用。

sent.orig: Simplified hough transformation(HT) and adaptive including box method(AIB) approach are proposed.
sent.trans: 提出了简化的霍夫变换HT(Hough Transform)方法和适应性包容盒AIB(Adaptive Including Box)原理。

sent.orig: Try to make this small experiment: Create a box, and place a sphere on top it.
sent.trans: 来做一个简单的试验：创建一个box,然后在上面放一个球体。

sent.orig: Buried Oxide Layer (BOX) - The layer that insulates between the two wafers.
sent.trans: 氧化埋层(BOX)-在两个晶圆片间的绝缘层。
